ResourceHeader.Description: The geomagnetic equatorial Dst index at 1-hr time resolution, derived at World Data Center for Geomagnetism, Kyoto, Kyoto University.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: If the data are used in publications and presentations, the data suppliers and the WDC for Geomagnetism, Kyoto must properly be acknowledged.

InformationURL.Name: Geomagnetic Equatorial Dst index Home Page
InformationURL.Description: The web site with links to pages describing the internationally accepted standard technique for generating the Dst Index and for access to the index data in WDC format.

AccessURL.Name: Geomagnetic Data Service
AccessURL.Description: Geomagnetic Data Service at World Data Center for Geomagnetism, Kyoto.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: If the data are used in publications and presentations, the data suppliers and the WDC for Geomagnetism, Kyoto must properly be acknowledged.

Parameter.Name: Universal Time
Parameter.Description: Time is expressed with year, month, day, and hour, each stored in integer format. Details of the data record format is described at http://wdc.kugi.kyoto-u.ac.jp/dstae/format/dstformat.html

Parameter.Name: Geomagnetic Equatorial Dst index
Parameter.Description: The Dst index is calculated by the sum of base value (unit 100nT) and 24 hourly value (unit 1nT). Details of the data record format is described at http://wdc.kugi.kyoto-u.ac.jp/dstae/format/dstformat.html
